metadata.title: Leather Case Compatible with Apple iPad 2 / iPad 3rd Gen / The new iPad / iPad with Retina display / iPad 4, Red
features: Keep your iPad 2/3 scratch free with this synthetic leather case compatible with Apple iPad 2/3
Leather case cover can be transformed into a horizontal stand for the convenience of viewing slide shows or videos at 3 different angles
Unique design allows easy access to all buttons, controls & ports without having to remove the case. Top hole showcases Apple logo
description: Compatible With Apple: iPad 2/3/The new iPad/iPad with Retina display/iPad 4.An elastic loop attached to hold your stylus for convenience
